short_summary: Full bid - Request for Proposal. Graders
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to procure a grader
full_summary:
=================================================
### ALL WHEEL DRIVE MOTOR GRADER

#### Tender Information
----------------------------

*   **Tender Reference Number**: cb-675-86644461
*   **Solicitation Number**: W8476-246736/A
*   **Publication Date**: October 4, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: November 14, 2023, at 14:00:00

#### Tender Status
----------------

*   **Tender Status**: Expired

#### Delivery and Contract Details
------------------------------------

*   **Contracting Entity**: National Defence
*   **Delivery Location**: Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt, British Columbia
*   **Contract Duration**: The contract period includes an initial 180 days after the contract award, and subsequently, a further 180 days after any amendments to the contract. 

#### Criteria and Terms
-----------------------

*   **Evaluation Criteria**: The contract will be awarded to the bidder offering the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.
*   **Security Requirements**: None
*   **Negotiations**: The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement
*   **Language**: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada

#### Contact Information
---------------------

*   **Contact Name**: Genevie Roach
*   **Contact Email**: [genevieve.roach@forces.gc.ca](mailto:genevieve.roach@forces.gc.ca)
*   **Contact Phone**: (000) 000-0000
*   **Attachments**: 
    *   [w8476-246736-a-en-rfp-amendment-001.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20905/w8476-246736-a-en-rfp-amendment-001.pdf)
    *   [w8476-246736-a-en-rfp-original_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20905/w8476-246736-a-en-rfp-original_0.pdf)

### Notice

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires a single (1) quantity of an All-Wheel Drive Grader for delivery to Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt, British Columbia, 180 days after award of the contract, and optionally, one (1) more unit may be delivered within Canada 180 days after contract amendment.
